snippet: The awards will be determined through online voting, and handed out at a show with big-name performers like Lady Gaga and Eminem, and directed by Spike Jonze.
abstract: Winners of first YouTube Music Awards will be determined by data like number of times of videos have been viewed and shared, or number of spinoffs they have inspired.
lead_paragraph: The awards will be determined through online voting, and handed out at a show with big-name performers like Lady Gaga and Eminem, and directed by Spike Jonze.

headline.main: YouTube Plans a Music Awards Show Live From New York
